participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, with a love for creativity and exploration.
participant_1.background: I'm not the healthiest person, but I do enjoy touring with Frank Ocean and I love ice cream. I need the energy of the city to fuel my never-ending work. My major is in business administration. I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion. I'm still looking for someone to share my life with.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, with a passion for literature and a sweet tooth.
participant_2.background: I love my husband's cooking, but I'm a sucker for a good piece of chocolate. I read to relax and clear my head. I am hoping to move to Australia soon to marry my boyfriend. I do not like waking up early. I moved out when I was 14.

content.text: I hope you're having a good day!
I am doing well! Just moved to Australia to marry my boyfriend!
That's so exciting! How did you meet?
We met online and started dating long distance. I visited him a few times and finally decided to move here.
That's so cute! Do you like it there?
I love it here! I'm not a morning person so the time difference is great.
I can relate! I'm not a morning person either.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read and play video games.
That's cool! I love to read too. What are your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series and the Hunger Games series.
I've read both of those! I love them too.
Oh, I've never read one of those.
They're really good! They can help you learn new things and improve yourself.
I might have to check one out!
